scripts.start: yarn run init && cross-env RUN_ENV=sit react-native start --port 8082
scripts.build-ios:sit: yarn run init && cross-env PLATFORM=ios RUN_ENV=sit node src/scripts/buildBundle
scripts.build-android:sit: yarn run init && cross-env PLATFORM=android RUN_ENV=sit node src/scripts/buildBundle
scripts.build-ios: yarn run init && cross-env PLATFORM=ios RUN_ENV=prod node src/scripts/buildBundle
scripts.build-android: yarn run init && cross-env PLATFORM=android RUN_ENV=prod node src/scripts/buildBundle
scripts.unused-check: yarn run init && cross-env PLATFORM=ios RUN_ENV=prod UNUSED_CHECK=1 node src/scripts/buildBundle
scripts.unused-check:delete: yarn run init && cross-env PLATFORM=ios RUN_ENV=prod UNUSED_CHECK=2 node src/scripts/buildBundle
